result.title: Help needed in number theory problem
result.content: Facing a lot of difficulty in solving this problem from a long time. Problem Link-SAS002. Naive approach O(sqrt(n)) clearly times out. How to solve this problem in given time limit and what is the intended time complexity of the algorithm? Thought about finding number of divisors in O(n^(1/3)) and using that, after some research.Is that correct approach?
